ground_truth_description:
A tanker truck drove into the gas station, and next to it was a man in white with a red hat.
A man in red got off the tanker and looked at it before returning to the tanker.
The oil tanker reversed and then drove forward for a distance and stopped.
The man in red got out of the car and left.
The man in white got on top of the oil tanker.
The oil tanker suddenly caught fire. The man in white fell out of the car with fire on his body and rolled on the ground.
A pipe sprayed fire several times.
